archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Identify Additional Product Offering Purchase Processing
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Identify additional processing for an inbound purchase in the form of a product offering order, such as one from a customer, the purchase may require a feasibility assessment, may require new provisioning activities, may require a change to a previous purchase, or may require cancellation of a previously initiated purchase.

properties.value: Not used for this process element.
